definition: lit. success and failure, the gains and losses (idiom)/fig. to weigh up various factors
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
surname Cheng
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to lose/to miss/to fail

sentences.english: The last discuss the role of music creation and its success or failure.
sentences.chinese: 其三，讨论音乐的创作作用及成败得失。

sentences.english: Gain and loss of its success or failure, already caused the widespread attention of people.
sentences.chinese: 其成败得失，已引起人们的普遍关注。

sentences.english: But also the right to maintain a normal look at the success or failure.
sentences.chinese: 保持一颗平常心还要正确看待成败得失。
